nodes.text: A task force was under the command of Captain Ralchio Nervi within the Galactic Empire as a unit of the Imperial Navy. The task force participated in the Battle of Xorrn against an allied group of anti-Imperials, until they were reinforced by the Allied Armada of the Alliance to Restore the Republic. The flagship of the task force was the Gladiator I Blood Ambition and further consisted of the two Raider I-class corvettes Sargantuan and the Warhawk. The task force's ground complement was led by Lieutenant Colonel Erle Hovlinn, and had a starfighter complement of at least two squadrons.
